Notes

Issued in a triple gatefold sleeve with printed inner sleeves. 140g pressing with original etching on side F. Recut by Noel Summerville from original DAT master. Includes a postcard sized sticker sheet with hexagon die cut stickers, and an MP3 download code card. ℗ 2002 warp records ltd. © 2013 warp records ltd. made in the eu.
